channel.title: Llm on Momori Nakano
channel.description: Recent content in Llm on Momori Nakano

item.title: PDF Summarizer with Ollama in 20 Lines of Rust
item.description: Explore the simplicity of building a PDF summarization CLI app in Rust using Ollama, a tool similar to Docker for large language models (LLM). Ollama allows for local LLM execution, unlocking a myriad of possibilities. This post guides you through leveraging Ollama’s functionalities from Rust, illustrated by a concise example. Since PDF is a prevalent format for e-books or papers, it would be useful to be able to summarize it.
